name: trajectoryintersection
title: Intersect Trajectories
description: Return the trajectory segments that intersect a given polygon

inputs.name: input_table_polygon
inputs.title: Polygon table
inputs.description: Table containing the polygon to intersect

inputs.name: tpoints_col
inputs.title: Trajectory points column
inputs.description: Column containing the points for each trajectory

inputs.name: join_type
inputs.title: Join type
inputs.description: How to join trajectories and polygons
inputs.helper: If 'Key Join' is selected, the component will join the trajectories and polygons using a key column. If 'Cross Join' is selected, the component will join the trajectories and polygons using all the rows in the trajectories and polygons tables. Using 'Cross Join' could result in a large number of rows in the output table.

inputs.name: traj_key_col
inputs.title: Join Key (Trajectories)
inputs.description: Column from the Trajectories table to be used as key when joining with the polygons

inputs.name: polygon_key_col
inputs.title: Join Key (Polygons)
inputs.description: Column from the Polygons table to be used as key when joining with the trajectories

inputs.name: polygon_col
inputs.title: Polygon geometries column
inputs.description: Column containing the geometries of the polygons

inputs.name: return_polygon_properties
inputs.title: Return polygon properties
inputs.description: If enabled, the component will also return all the columns from the polygons table

inputs.name: intersection_method
inputs.title: Intersection method
inputs.description: Whether to return the individual points or segments

outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The table with the intersected trajectories
